1.text:
### Waterfall! 
 When the first person on the team starts drinking, the next person on the team starts drinking until the person before them stops.

2.text:
### Hit the Deck 
 Everyone drop to the ground and lay with their forehead down.  Last one there has to stay on the ground for three turns.

3.text:
### Storytime 
 Tell an embarrassing story from middle school.

4.text:
### Bitchin' 'Bout Bugs 
 Tell a story about one of the mnost annoying bugs you've ever had to fix.

5.text:
### No Touching 
 If any team member touches their nose for the next three turns, they take a drink

6.text:
### No Swearing 
 If any team member swears for the next three turns, take a drink.

7.text:
### Pick Your Poison 
 Take a shot of a drink chosen by the team member to your left.

8.text:
### Impressions 
 Every team member has to speak like Christian Bale's Batman for three turns.

9.text:
### Do You Even Startup, Bro? 
 Every team member has to start their sentences with hashtag and end them with 'dot com' for the next three turns.

10.text:
### No Pronouns 
 No team member can use pronouns for the next three turns.  If they do, take a drink!

11.text:
### Whose Rule Is It Anyways? 
 The opposing team gets to make up a rule which your team has to follow.

12.text:
### Now Meow 
 Everyone has to use the word 'meow' instead of 'now ' for the next three turns... or take a drink!

13.text:
### Who is me? 
 No team member can speak in the first person for the next three turns.

14.text:
### T-Rex Arms 
 Whenever a team member goes to drink over the next three turns, they have to lock their elbows at their sides to give them little T-Rex arms.  If they forget, drink again.

15.text:
### Little Green Man 
 For the next three turns, everyone in the game has to remove the 'Little Green Man' sitting on the rim of their cup before drinking from it, or else they have to drink twice!

16.text:
### Ditto 
 Every team member repeats the last word of every sentence they say for the next three turns, or they drink!

17.text:
### No Names 
 You can't refer to any team member by their actual name for the next five turns, use some nickname instead.  Use their name, take a drink!

18.text:
### Boot Camp 
 For the next three turns, you must end any response to any member of the other team with 'Sir, yes, sir!'

19.text:
### Bottoms Up! 
 Quick and easy -- everyone on the team finish their drinks and pour another.

20.text:
### No Phones 
 If any team member touches their cellphone for the next five turns, they take a drink.

21.text:
### Vikings 
 Any time a member of the opposite team motions their hands to their head as if they were horns on a viking helmet, every person on your team has to copy them.  Lasts four turns, last person to do so takes a drink.
